text: The futsal competitions at the 2017 Asian Indoor and Martial Arts Games in Ashgabat took place at the Ice Palace in Ashgabat. ==Medalists== {| |- |Men | Sepehr Mohammadi Alireza Samimi Mohammad Kazuya Shimizu Takuya Uehara Masaya Hashimoto Atsuya Uemura |- |Women | Ariya Kritsawong Suchada Wapeena Jenjira Bubpha Sawitree Mamyalee Hataichanok Tappakun Jiraprapa Tupsuri Pacharaporn Srimuang
